title: Bug 110566 - Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression is set on row[0]
description: When setting a filter expression like 'row[0] equals to 0', the data set returns an incorrect result or just returns a null result set.
OB: The data set is returning an incorrect result or a null result set when the filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0' is set.
EB: Instead of returning an incorrect or null result set, a relevant error message should pop up.
SR:
1. Open the data set.
2. Set the filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0'.
3. Observe if the data set returns an incorrect result or a null result set.
4. Verify if a relevant error message pops up instead.
